channel.title: Help PLEASE
channel.description:
I need help here are my questions.
1. how do i get shops to sell certain items? 2. How do i get effects when my weapon attacks? 3. How do i have my server run so peaple can get on my server?(does it have to do with the router?) 4. Where i want to teleport and put in coordinats it always say wrong syntax.
If you can answer these please.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 06, 2006, 04:06:48 PM[/size][hr]is anyone on? :mad: :mad: :mad:[br][size=1]Posted at: October 06, 2006, 04:19:28 PM[/size][hr]Oh and how do u have npcs talk and sell stuff?
